j4careAMDcm4cheeURL.title: DCM4CHEE Import-RS URL
j4careAMDcm4cheeURL.description: REST Endpoint URL for Import RS

j4careAMExtractionPath.title: Extraction Path
j4careAMExtractionPath.description: Path to extract Blob files - must match the Filesystem configruation of the filesystem descriptor used in the DCM4CHEE URL

j4careAMMigrationPath.title: Migration Path
j4careAMMigrationPath.description: Path where Blob files are located

j4careAMPathPattern.title: Path Pattern
j4careAMPathPattern.description: Path Pattern to extract Blob files (f.e. 2021/01/23/{00100020,hash}/{0020000D,hash}/{0020000E,hash}/{00080018,hash})

j4careAMQueueName.title: JMS Queue Name
j4careAMQueueName.description: JMS Queue Name where Migration Orders are stored

j4careAMContinueOnStartup.title: Continue On Startup
j4careAMContinueOnStartup.description: Automatically start the next scheduled batch on startup
